condition.saying: I aint got any tattoos, but I do got some horribly disfiguring scars. Theres only one story there, n its The End.

Heh... I was hopin' to meet some friendly faces tonight, but I wasn't expectin' this friendly...

Heh, well, I suppose it's nice to not have those pesky odds against me for once.

case.state: Yeah, that's a good point. Heh, I think seein' him stripping would be even more nightmare-inducing.

condition.saying: fighting the swarm

case.state: Yeah... 'I ain't one to usually get angry in battle, but that kinda holier-than-thou attitude about exterminatin' everything they see is just too much.

condition.saying: one sentiment

case.state: Hm... Well, maybe I oughta try givin' Artanis and our other Protoss buddies that tip. If they're gonna be convinced, it won't be by terrans like us.
Well, I certainly like to think so... But I should warn you, I go pretty hard with my expectations too.
Hm... guess that's certainly somethin' to keep in mind, all things considered...
Well, I never thought I'd see someone who can talk to the dead. You never really know who you'll meet at this place, right?
Heh heh, alright - consider my memory wiped already, Miko.
Don't blame yourself, kid. I'm over it for the most part... even if my ghosts ain't completely silent just yet.
Hah hah! Just kiddin'. You got quite the interestin' imagination, don't you, Reimu?
Hah! Oh, don't look so worried, I'm only jokin'. Do you usually go assuming anyone bigger than you is a cannibal?
Well then... now you're speakin' my language, Syrenne. Consider yourself on my good side already.
Oh, trust me - you don't know the half of it, man.
Yeah... he deserved a hell of a lot better, for sure.
Certainly hope so. Got my eyes on a few of 'em already, and I can't keep runnin' this band forever.
Yeah... I bet it would, Yusuke.
Heh, and here my grandfather used to say that art was just for yuppies. I'd love to see what he'd think of all you're sayin'.
Heh heh... imagine that. Don't think flattery's gonna stop me from beatin' you now, though - I ain't ready to call defeat just yet.
Heh, that determined to try out some interstellar cuisine, are you? Alright, Yusuke - if you're up for a bit of a detour, I'll make sure we get the finest fried rainbow-fin albacore in Koprulu!
Yeah... unfortunately I know what you mean a bit too well.
..."Aqua Grunt"? You ain't serious, are you?
...You want me to just call you "Aqua Grunt"? You sure about that?
Since losin' supplies was no longer as big a concern, we then started colonizin' livable planets wherever we could find 'em... Think you got all that, Miss Tsumiki?
We didn't have to worry about not bein' able to return home if things went bad anymore, so colonizin' planets was easier... You follow all that, Miss Tsumiki?
Suppose that's a good point. I'll keep it in mind if I ever feel like rockin' it medieval style.
Hm... Alright, sure. Ask all you want, Arueshalae - no need to be shy.
Heh, if you think that's impressive, wait 'till I tell you 'bout our other tech, darlin'.
Exactly. Whatever demons live off of, you'd be puttin' the hurt on 'em real good if you managed to snatch it.
Exactly. Most of us had it personal with the Dominion in some way or another.
Heh, I'm sure you're right. That reminds me, we still need to find out what happened to Stetmann...
...Heh, you know, when I said you didn't need to feel shy, Arueshalae, I wasn't quite expectin' this.
Heh, your mind's racin' already, then? Guess now I have to show you whether or not I live up to it...
Good. If you take anything from tonight, make sure it's that.
Defeat death? Damn... that's quite the tall offer you're makin' there, Miko. 'Fraid I'll have to decline, though.
Axes? Oh... right. You come from one of the worlds that ain't too familiar with firearms, right?
Well, I don't really live in the Nexus. It's more like a... vacation spot, maybe? I dunno, it's surprisngly complicated.
Well, to be fair, a good amount of the people I know have wanted me dead at one point or another.
Heh, slow down there, Sheena. Your mind on somethin' else right now?
...Guess I see your point. Alright, consider me open to your lessons, Miko... though I think I can deal with hangovers well enough already.
Hm... guess this place really does draw all types from all over...
Well then... I did hear there'd be some real different folks at this joint...
Heh, you ain't gotta worry, Pit - I ain't the type to fly off the handle easy.
That's good to hear. I've had my thoughts read a few too many inopportune times.
...Actually, I think I'd prefer if you just kept quiet.
...Do you usually get your kicks out of makin' folks feel awkward?
Don't worry, I'll be more generous soon. Not the time to be a Scrooge, after all.
Wouldn't mind wearin' those while riding my vulture, but I don't think they're made for that sorta thing.
It's definitely nice to not wear a belt that's bein' weighed down, too.
Buckle's a lot showier than I'd like, though. Never liked the types who wanted to show those off.
Still got the same ol' shirt, though. Sorry, just like keepin' some things simple.
That said, it cost more than I would've thought... so it better not get dirty.
Pretty good for keepin' warm... though I doubt they'd help much on a snow planet like Kaldir or Braxis.
Didn't get 'em too wet before this, thankfully - I'd hate to get this floor messy... or messier than usual, anyway.
'Sides, the hat keeps my ears warm. Can't go wrong with that.
It ain't like there's anything festive about my underwear anyway - wanna make it last just a bit more.
Gettin' real down to it, now... and you ain't gonna bribe me with milk and cookies, either.
Whaddya say? Still feel like playin' nice... or are you leaning more towards naughty now?
Beat me again, and... well, it won't be the north pole you'll be seein', heh.
You know, I briefly considered comin' here with a fake beard too. Decided it might be going a bit too far.
Might as well make me the sleigh too, 'cause I feel red as hell.
Funny - I'm playin' fair, yet I feel like I'm gonna end up on the naughty list.
Clearly, the cards have failed us... oh, sorry, I meant me.
I expect to see this back by the end of the night, got it?
Well, no use in cryin' about it. Time to turn things around.
Hey, I've still got an ace up my sleeve... ah, not literally, of course.
Don't count me out just yet - a bourbon cowboy always picks himself back up!
Sorry, boys and girls, you're gonna need to work if you want something bigger.
Probably should've removed the shells from that before I came here anyway.
Hopefully I won't be needin' any ammo in a bar like this anyway.
Hate to give this up... that ol' piece's been with me for years.
Better not lose this, dealer. Had it since my outlaw days.
If any of you are thinkin' about swipin' it, good luck finding the ammo it needs first.
These boots were made for walkin'... but I don't need 'em to walk all over you.
Bit of a shame. I like how sturdy those boots feel.
How's that song go, again? "I got boots, and socks, and I'm bringin' 'em home to you!"
Sure hoping it ain't been long since you last cleaned this floor, barkeep.
Well... I'm guessin' at least a few of you are enjoyin' the view.
'Least I'm not drunk this time... actually, I'm not sure if that makes it worse or better.
Come to think of it, maybe I oughta give that old thing a wash when this is done.
Hoo boy... I gotta pick things up, and fast!
C'mon, cards, don't fail me now!
Yeah, this is about as bad as it can get.
C'mon, show something good for your competitors here...
Well? Show us what you're workin' with.
Hey, I've seen Protoss with nothin' on 'em. I doubt this'll be worse, partner.
C'mon, ~player~, let's see some enthusiasm.
Hey, don't get too down about it, kid - have some fun with it!
You've been lookin' good so far, partner - I doubt that'll change.
Heh, feelin' good about this, ~player~?
I'd be lyin' if I said I wasn't still curious myself...
You feel lucky, kid? 'Cause I think we all sure do right now.
Whaddya say, ~player~? Wanna put on a good show for ol' Jimmy?
You gonna stick to your word, ~player~?
Tough break, kid.
My condolences, ~player~.
Still in it to win it?
How's that for a whoop-ass hand?
Like I always say, don't mess with Mar Sara!
I'd say I feel bad... but I don't wanna be insincere.
I could do this all day long.
Don't tangle with a Raider, kid!
Still in the game, kid? I think you still got this.
Hey, you ain't in the loser's circle just yet.
Heh... 'least luck's riding better with you tonight.

condition.saying: Nn-- S-so, Pit, you're...

case.state: Hehey, easy up, lil' devil. Want me to get you some water? You're lookin' real thirsty.
Regular card shark, are ya? Might have to step up my game real soon, considerin' you don't look a stranger to the table.
{small}You know, sparky, if you've ever got time, I wouldn't mind givin' you a tour of the Hyperion. Wanna show you what a real revolution flagship looks like.{!reset}
You're lookin' a mite pale there, partner - you alright?
That's a... different complexion you got there, pal. When was the last time you saw a sun?
So, Deimos - you said you were a merc earlier, right?
Thought I heard you mentioning mercenary work earlier, Deimos - I take it you're no stranger to the field?
Don't know anything about Nevada, but it sounds like a real dangerous place, greyblood.
So, this "Nevada"... how long's it been a warzone, greyblood?
You sound like quite the capable merc, greyblood... interested in takin' on some interstellar work?
{small}You know, mercs can make quite the pretty penny in the Koprulu sector greyblood... if you want, I can hook you up with a good contractor.{!reset}
Y'know, I've seen joints that'll let in folk with just about anything... but a whole rocket launcher? Really?
Jeez, and I was surprised when they didn't ask me to hand over my sixgun... they really let you sneak in a rocket launcher, Brock?

state.text: Well, you may be here for fun tonight, rocketman, but I can tell you've seen some business with that thing too.
Alright, rocketman - if you don't intend on firin' that thing here tonight, then where d'you usually do it?

case.state: Heh, arms gettin' tired yet, rocketman?
Sorry, rocketman, but you're gonna have to set that thing down eventually.
Hm? Wait... that wouldn't happen to be-
Quite the drawl you got there, card shark - it wouldn't happen to be common where you come from, would it?
So what are your comrades like, Rocketman? You've mentioned 'em a fair bit already, but I wanna know more.
Well, you've told me about your battlefield, Rocketman, but now I wanna know about your partners-in-crime. Who you got watchin' your back?
Well now, a fellow revolver enthusiast? Don't see too many of those nowadays.
Gotta say, I like the cut of your jib already, partner. Especially your weapons of choice.
So I assume gamblin's your main trick of trade? I'm kinda curious as to what it's like livin' off of it.
Gotta say, I don't think I've ever seen the kinda card tricks you've been pulling off tonight with your deck there, partner... my eyes ain't just foolin' me, are they?
So, Yusuke; word 'round here is that you're involved in quite the interesting group; mind tellin' me more?
So what's the deal with these "Phantom Thieves" I've been hearin' about? My curiosity's real piqued, Yusuke.
So if I've got this right, you're sayin' that any card, even the ones we're all holding here right now - you could turn them into magic weapons in an instant?
A handsome rogue like yourself strikes me as the sort who ain't shy to havin' a fair share of partners and flings in the past. Am I right about that?
Hey, kid - you said you were into planting crops earlier?
So yeah, back when I was a kid I was a farmboy. Helped my parents ever since I could hold a pitchfork. Hell, wasn't long before they taught me to drive the combine harvester too.
Oh, yeah, I mentioned a war earlier... you know the saying, 'beat their swords into plowshares'? Well, many others and I kinda had to do the opposite.
Well, what else do you do anyway, kid?
I get your sentiment, Yusuke; my boys and I feel better workin' with the law now rather than having them on our asses. Though some of 'em do miss the outlaw days. You ever feel that?
It's impressive to hear you kept at your art stuff going, even back when the Thieves were at their most radical. How'd you balance 'em out?
Sounds like you still hold your work pretty highly either way, Yusuke. I take it your leader probably helped with that?
You know, Yusuke, everyone's got their own story for meetin' up with a group like that; usually pretty interesting ones. What's yours?
You know, there's quite a bit of irony in a 'Phantom Thief' gettin' this exposed in front of everyone. Not the kinda thing you expected to see yourself in, is it?
Funny - a place like this is about the last I'd expect to see an angel. I ain't gotta get ready for the apocalypse, do I?
So, let me get this straight - you're some kinda angel soldier of Heaven, right?
Looks like we got a regular card shark here, don't we? You look like you feel right at home, Yuno.
Don't think I've ever seen someone with as much passion for cards as you. Have you always been like this, Yuno?
Don't worry about it, Lux. Please.
Nah, don't trouble yourself with that, Lux. I insist.
Well, I've seen more of Tychus than I ever wanted to before. This won't phase me, ~name~.
Not exactly what I came for tonight... but I suppose it's only fair.
Gotta say, sparky, I like your spunk. You definitely need some if you don't want your revolution to die out.
Y'know, Sparky, you kinda remind me of myself back in my younger days. Hopefully without the screw-ups, though.
Sorry, ~name~, but it's time to man up.
I'm just glad I'm not playin' this with my usual poker company. No disrespect to 'em, but they ain't exactly pretty.
Hope you're not plannin' to just complain the whole time - get to it!
Just be glad you're not up against Matt. You'd be smoked by now.
Well, you're up, ~name~. Don't disappoint.
Haha, yeah, another one in the bag!
Guess that's another one for me! Time to pay the due, ~name~!
Should probably keep my eyes closed here...
Well, ain't this quite the pickle... uh, the one I'm in, so to speak.
J-Just do it..
Alright, let's make things real interestin'!
I'm not coming off too eager about this, am I?
Don't worry, girl, Sarah won't hear about this.
Sorry, ~player~, but it's too late to back out now.
Don't worry - unlike a lot of my boys, I can keep a secret.
Hoo... this is gettin' real in more ways than one!
Sorry, ~player~, but that's the way it bounces.
My condolences, ~player~.
Well... not gonna lie, I've been kinda interested in this.
We're all friends here, ~player~, I won't judge.
It's still a fair game, ~player~; let's keep it that way.
How's that for a whoop-ass hand?
Like I always say, don't mess with Mar Sara!
I'd say I feel bad... but I don't wanna be insincere.
I could do this all day long.
Don't underestimate me, miss - I always come through in a pinch.
Well... guess I'm still fortunate in one way.
Hey, you ain't out just yet, are you?
Dazzle us good, ~player~... and then make your comeback.
Mmm...
You're quite the looker, ~player~, so have some fun with it!
C'mon, ~player~, let's see more of that natural beauty!
If someone had to lose this round, ~player~... well, I ain't sad that it's you.
Show us what you got, ~player~. 'Cause I can tell you've got quite a lot.
Alright, ~player~... show ol' Jimmy somethin' good.
Mind flippin' your hair while you strip, ~player~?
So... an academy for magic kids, huh? Sure hope it's better than the Confederacy or Dominion's Ghost academies.
Christ... you say that like the very concept of not killin' folk makes you nauseous, kid.
'Sides, if ~human.ifMale(he's|she's)~ willin' to help out someone like you, kid... then I don't think it matters if they've dabbled in savin' folk from time to time.
"Team Aqua," huh... I don't suppose they happen to be related to this Team Magma, do they?
So let me guess... this "Team Aqua" is connected to Magma somehow?
Alright... guess I oughta learn about Team Magma if I'm takin' the time to learn about Aqua too.
...Am I right in assumin' the "Team Magma" you're preachin' about here is a street gang of sorts?
Settle down there, boss. You've got your shoes, right? You can still stay well ahead even after takin' those off.
Well, speakin' as a plain fellow myself, I got no objections if anyone else does.
Well, it's a pretty natural choice, ain't it? Don't think anyone minds, especially if you're still a bit nervous about this.
Oh, shoot, hadn't thought of that. I hope you'd at least prepared for the possibility this would happen, right?
You don't have anything to fear from us, boss - but like I said, we're willin' to help if you still ain't certain.
Well, um, if it helps at all, boss, I don't think the others will view 'em like that.
Hey, we're all happy to have you here, boss. Just... go with the flow, and you'll be fine.
So what's this "Big Dango Family" you mentioned, boss? The name's got a bit of a crime group sound to it, but that can't be right.
You're pretty soft-spoken, aren't you, boss? Don't usually find folks like you at this kinda place - not that anyone minds, I'm sure.
Gotten a good look around this place yet? I'm still pretty amazed by all the different types of folks here.
Your friend, Miyazawa - you mentioned she's like a mom? She the school's librarian?
If you don't mind me askin', why does your school make you wear uniforms anyway? Back on Shiloh, they didn't care too much how we dressed 'long as we got our work done right.
Well... how are you feelin', boss? Still nervous?
I, uh... sorry about this, boss.
Heh, it's certainly one hell of a time. Quite the coin-eater, though.
I'd be down for showin' you... only if you don't mind me beatin' your high score, though.
So how long have you been takin' royal duties, Miko? You talk like someone who's as familiar with it as breathin'.
You certainly know how to dress like royalty, Miko... and I'm guessin' you aint far from the status, either.
Funny thing is, everyone talks about their mass murder nowadays, but it's easy to forget the smaller crimes. The things that broke people day by day.
It's a bit of a shame - we succeeded in topplin' the Dominion's regime and are workin' on reforming it, but the Kel-Morians are gonna be just the same as ever.
I'm impressed you know so much about these issues, Monika. Never gave much thought if they would hit close to home for Earth-dwellers.
Heh, ain't it funny how things work out, Monika? Both of us came here to strip folks down, and here we are talkin' about the plights of the workin' class.
Fond of ~player~, I take it. Hope they're nearly as smart as you, Monika.
Ah... Sorry, hope I ain't makin' this too awkward or anything.
So, you used to lead a biker gang, Saki? Bet you were known as quite the hellraiser.
Heh, with your kinda rep, Saki, I bet you'd be hell on wheels in the seat of a Vulture.
I'd ask if you're serious, lil' red, but given the usual lineup here... that ain't just a costume you're wearin', is it?
Quite the wizard's garb you're wearin'... you wouldn't happen to be from Azeroth, would you?
Hey, lil' red... you said your name was Megumin, right?
Well now, a popular singer showin' to a strip poker game? Certainly don't hear about that sorta thing often.
I wouldn't expect this to be your kinda scene, Miss Sakura. Any particular reason you came here?
Sure feels nice to chitchat about bikin' with someone again... well, other than Swann, but he's no fun.
Somethin' going on, Miss Sakura? You seem to be takin' this one harder than before.
Just so we're clear... you feelin' alright? Bein'... this ain't painful for you or anything?
So, Miss Jolyne - word on the street's that you've done a fair bit of fightin' the law?
I hear you were holed up in one tough prison, Miss Jolyne - what was that like?
You don't seem to me like the type who'd cross the law so hard, Miss Jolyne - but word 'round here says different.
Gettin' rid of your dress now? That's... too bad. Looked real good on ya.
You're... holdin' up pretty well for bein' a zombie, Saki. Gotta say I'm impressed.
Hm? You gonna take off somethin' real big now?
Quite the hairpiece you got there, Nep - you a gamin' enthusiast?
Gotta say, I'm more used to seein' those buttons on arcade cabinets than someone's hair.
Pretty nice ring there... someone special in your life?
Gotta say, I don't see your kinda dress code every day, Jo'.
People dress like that often where you're from, Jo'? Fasion sense must be off the wall there.
So, what's it like in your sector, Miss Meia? Seen a lot in your travels?
You look like quite the experienced lass, Miss Meia; seen a lot around your sector?
You seem familiar with ~player~, Chara - you come here together?
You and ~player~ go way back or somethin', Chara? Seems like you know each other well.
What do you know about ~player~, Chara? Didn't know you two were compadres before this.
You're sure dolled up real nice, Miss Jura - bit of a shame it's gonna all have to come off you here.
Don't usually see people here dress up as nicely as you, Miss Jura. This ain't your usual kinda thing, is it?
You knew this was strip poker, right? Seems a bit of a waste to dress up that nicely for this kinda game.
So what brings you here tonight, Revy? You strike me as more of the lone drinker type, if you catch my drift.
{small}Wouldn't have expected you to swing by this kinda joint for some skin 'n action, Revy. Don't wanna presume, but you don't strike me as a real people person.{!reset}
So, how exactly you make your livin', Revy? I'm guessin' those handcannons there ain't just for show.
Call me curious, but what kinda racket you got runnin', Revy? Sounds like you've been at it quite some time.
Where you keepin' all those smokes, anyway? Your pockets ain't exactly military-grade.
How many cigs is that now, Revy? I've lost track.
So, Chara... how about we go back to the earlier topic of you bein' dead?
Gotta say, Chara, you look like you're doing awful well for someone who was dead.
So you were dead, and then ~player~ brought you back... how'd you even die in the first place, Chara?
{small}Funny, never really gotten to talk with an isolationist before. Well, other than the Dark Templar Protoss, but they kinda changed their ways more recently.{!reset}
{small}Gotta say, yours is the first time I've heard of an isolationist colony that's actually doin' well. Other than the Dark Templar Protoss, that is.{!reset}
You asked about Sarah earlier, Miss Galatea... well, she deserved a helluva lot better than what the Koprulu Sector gave her, I tell ya.
So how'd you trick out your bike, Saki? Just about every biker I knew customized their ride in some way.
So, Meia - if I'm gettin' this right, your planets are separated by men and women, right? How's that even work?
Apologies, Meia, but I'm still tryin' to wrap my head around this - you're all separated by men and women where you're from?
{small}It's definitely a relief to see this zombie thing ain't too bad for you, Saki. The ones I'm most familiar with... typically don't end up as good.{!reset}
Heard you talkin' before about these "Pokemon", Miss Cynthia - mind answerin' my curiosity?
So what exactly are these "Pokemon" you're goin' on about, Miss Cynthia? Gotta say I'm curious.
Actually, Galatea, bein' honest... you kinda remind me of Sarah yourself.
Well, Chara, you've got my curiosity hook, line, and sinker. What have you and ~player~ been up to together?
Alright, I've gotta know - after all that, what have you and ~player~ been doin' together this whole time?
You've been real quiet so far, kiddo... everythin' all right?
{small}So, kiddo... I've worked with and lead all kinds of folk over the years, and they each had their own issues and whatnot they were dealin' with...{!reset}
{small}You know, I've seen whole words get ravaged and destroyed before, Chara. And each time, I just kept thinkin' about all those innocent lives who didn't deserve it.{!reset}
{small}Gotta say, I ain't no stranger to seein' whole worlds destroyed, Chara. Nor to monsters who don't care what happens to those caught up in it.{!reset}
You mentioned turf wars earlier, right? What were those like?
These Pokemon sure sound like they can be dangerous... hope you haven't had too many bad encounters with 'em.
Fascinatin' as they sound, these Pokemon sure seem deadly, too... your people have trouble with 'em often?
{small}So why do guys and gals even have a problem with each other to begin with? Not the kind of thing I've even heard of myself, Miss Meia.{!reset}
{small}So is there a reason guys and gals have issues with each other in the first place, Miss Meia? Messy as Koprulu is, we never had to deal with that.{!reset}
If you don't mind me askin', kiddo, why did you come out here? How'd you hear about this joint at all?
Actually, ain't that a school uniform, kiddo? Staff here are strict as anyone should be about age rules, so I'm hopin' you didn't sneak in.
You said you were an up-and-comin' chieftan earlier, right, Miss Yunyun?
I've been wonderin', Miss Yunyun... you mentioned somethin' about being future chief earlier, right?
Gotta wonder... what's it take to turn a kid like you into some bloodthirsty misanthrope, Chara?
So how does a young'un like yourself become a crazy killer anyhow, Chara? Sickness like yours don't pop up from nowhere.
I'm sure I'll regret askin', but... what's the world gotta do to turn a kid like you into a blood-hungry psychopath, Chara?
You know, cowgirl, I've seen ghosts who can shoot the wings off a butterfly... but you're somethin' else.
Alright, cowgirl, let's see what you've got!
You've certainly impressed so far, cowgirl... but how far are you willin' to go?
So... "Yunyun", right? I ain't mispronouncin' that?
{small}Sorry if I was puttin' you on the spot earlier, Miss Sakura. It's just that the zombies I'm used to... well, they usually don't do as peachy as you.{!reset}
{small}You know, Nep, I've heard a bit about how big the professional gamin' scene gets. You wouldn't happen to be one of them pros, would you?{!reset}
So, would you happen to be part of the pro gamin' scene, Nep? It ain't my thing, but I know how lucrative it can be.
What's your story with your ghostly gal there, Miko? There was probably a time when she was a bit more... alive, right?
So if you're gonna graduate soon, what are you plannin' to do after, kiddo? If you don't mind me askin', of course.
So what's next after high school, kiddo? Got college plans, or are you joinin' the workforce right after?
So that's it, Chara? Some bright, young child gets helplessly warped into a bloodthirsty demon by her new pal ~player~?
So you're tellin' me you got so hateful and bloodthirsty 'cause ~player~ turned you into this? Just like that, Chara?
So that's how it is, then? Your sense of right and wrong's just some casualty in ~player~'s conquest for power?
{small}Y'know, Miko, you said your marriage was arranged... but I'm guessin' there was somethin' more to it than just that, if y'all are still together even after the grave.{!reset}
{small}So yours was an arranged marriage, huh? Well... if not even death kept you two from bein' together, I'd wager it turned out better than most.{!reset}
So what brings you here, Supernova? I'd think a poker joint would seem more mundane when you're a dimension-hopper.
Hey, it's Supernova, right? If you got the whole multiverse at your fingertips... what seems so compellin' about this place?
Well, I don't get the chance to meet someone like you every day, so I gotta ask - any standout worlds you've seen?
I'm willin' to bet you've seen about a million places, Supernova - and rocked no shortage of 'em. Any real interestin' ones?
Heh... can't believe I didn't realize sooner, but it's kidna odd meetin' a second girl named "Nova".
Y'know, there's a bit of humor in this... would you believe me if I said you ain't the only "Nova" I've met?
So if you ain't a pro gamer, Nep, what is it you do? 'Cause I sure couldn't guess.
So how do you earn your keep, Nep? Pro gamin' was my only guess, so I'm all out.
Well, you and ~player~ better enjoy your conquest while it lasts, Chara... 'cause you ain't gonna go unopposed forever.
If you want my advice, Chara, here's all I'll say - don't expect to stay on top for much longer.
Word to the wise... or whatever the hell you are, Chara. Don't act shocked when someone finally stops you and ~player~.
So... you're a real ghost, huh... I definitely ain't in Koprulu anymore.
...Alright, did anyone else know this place was haunted before comin'? I mean, you seem like a friendly ghost, but still.
Y'know, people talk about findin' God in all kinds of places... but I ain't ever heard of 'em mention strip poker before.
I'm not really a prayin' man, Miss Palutena, but if I was... actually, I'm still not sure what a god would be doin' at a strip poker joint.
So what kinda god are you anyway, Miss Palutena? I'm hopin' you're a kind and lovin' sorta god, at least.
{small}Well, I've heard about all kinds of gods before, so I'm curious to ask what kind you are, Miss Palutena. Not one of the wrathful ones, I hope.{!reset}
Still with us, Miss Meridies? You seem kinda preoccupied.
I ain't gonna tell you how to play, Miss Meridies, but workin' on something else during this probably won't do you no favors.
{small}You know, Miss Meridies, I've met plenty of scientists and plenty of psionic-users in my day, but I ain't ever met someone who's both before.{!reset}
{small}Gotta say, Miss Meridies, I'm real interested about you. Haven't ever met someone with psionics- er, magic, tryin' to take a scientific approach to it.{!reset}
I know I don't look like the type, but... would you believe me if I said this wasn't my first time at a multiverse hub, either?
Actually, Nova, I've done a bit of dimension-hopping myself. Well, it was really just one other hub world, but I'd say it counts.
You sure love talkin' about these Pokemon, Miss Cynthia - and you got the knowledge to match, too. I take it you're a researcher of sorts?
There's a real passion in your voice when you talk about these Pokemon, Miss Cynthia. The kinda passion I only hear from scientists who've been in their field for years.
Okay, so... you're a goddess. Right. Mind explainin' how?
So... how does someone like you even become a goddess, anyway?
Bein' real, I'm really impressed, Miss Sakura. After how hindered I've seen most of the walkin' dead get, you're still movin' like you never died at all.
So what's bein' an idol like, Miss Sakura? I know a fair bit about the country business, but nothin' about the idol business.
Y'know, I'm all about the country scene, but the idol scene's a different world to me, Miss Sakura. What's it like?
So, I've seen my fair share of rulers over the years, Miko - each with their own ideas for leadin'. What's yours?
So... what does bein' a goddess usually entail for you? Like, how's it different from us poor mortals down here?
...Alright, take me through an average day in the life of the great goddess Neptune. What's bein' a goddess like for you, exactly?

Well, if there's any silver linin' to be found, Meia, it ain't too late for things to change. I think your folk would stop takin' the bullshit they'd been taught with the right opportunity, just like you.
I guess if we can glean somethin' good about your sector's troubles, Meia, I think your people are smart enough to learn better when the time comes. Hell, you clearly are.
Quite the studious type, aren't you, Miss Granger? Never heard of anyone preparin' so much for a casual poker game before.
Wouldn't expect a newcomer to sink so much time into studyin' the game beforehand, Miss Granger. You usually this dedicated?
So tell me more about bein' a trainer, Miss Cynthia. I imagine it takes quite the set of skills to train these Pokemon well.
You got a death grip 'round my curiosity right now, Miss Cynthia - what's bein' a trainer like? I'd imagine you've got a lot to tell.
I dunno if I'm just missin' something, Nep, but it sounds to me like bein' a goddess is just about doin' odd jobs.
So is that what bein' a goddess where you come from is like, Nep? Just doin' whatever odd tasks come up?
So how's the company 'round here look to you, kiddo? Found some friendly enough faces so far?
So, gotten a good chance to find some good folk here, kiddo? Hopin' Najimi knew what she was doin' bringing you here after all.
Heh... now that you mention it, wonder if I can drag Valerian here with you sometime... now that'd be a meetin' for the ages.
Well... you're certainly unlike any goddess I'd ever expect to meet, Nep. I mean that in a good way, though.
Well... you're at least a lot more pleasant than most other gods or goddesses folk typically hear about, Nep.
So how long exactly have you been doin' this? Nova? Sounds like this is far from your first or even hundreth rodeo.
Mind tellin' us how long you've been visitin' different worlds, Nova? Unless I'm mistaken, you sound pretty well-versed.
Well, I ain't gonna promise anything, but... how could I find one of your matches if I have another free day, Cynthia?
So, no guarantees, Cynthia, but... if I find myself with more time off eventually, any way I could watch one of your matches?
So lemme get this straight, Ms. Chell... that's a real AI you got there? It ain't just some old adjutant device manned by someone else miles away?
So what do you do together anyway? Figure it must be real important to have such an advanced adjutant unit on board for.
Okay, hang on just a goddamned minute. You're tellin' me that all the humans are dead, includin' the scientists? And there's still tests bein' done?!
Alright, guess I might as well ask now - what kinds of crazy experiments were you and Ms. Chell involved in, anyway? Somethin' to do with not dyin' along with everyone else, maybe?
So, Wheatley... how long exactly have you and Ms. Chell been travellin' together? Escapin' the facility, like you said?
So what's with the mask, Ms. Susie? It ain't exactly an obvious choice for pickin' clothing to ditch here, and it ain't all that pretty, either. No offense.
You know, most folks don't really come here with a creepy mask like that, Ms. Susie, especially not for a game as... well, intimate as this. What gives?
That? Wait... you ain't plannin' on-
You sure know a lot about bein' a ruler, Miko... heh, sorry if I kept bringin' it up so much. You probably came here to get away from all that.
Did you really come here expectin' money, Nami? It's pretty universal that dignity's the only thing on the line in strip poker.
You mentioned somethin' about making money here earlier, Nami? 'Cause unless the dealer offered you his job, I don't think you'll find it at the strip poker table.
So what's your story, Leonie? Judgin' by what you said about bein' someone's "finest apprentice", I'm guessing it ain't an ordinary one.
You said somethin' about being a great apprentice earlier, Leonie? Tell me more - you've piqued my interest.
So what's it like bein' an actual ghost, anyway? You seem like the type who doesn't mind a few questions or two about that, thankfully.
Heh, you're quite the eager lil' helper, Senko. Didn't expect to meet someone tonight so hell-bent on helpin' just about everyone she sees. How come?
So, is your need for sudden caretakin' common among fox spirits? I don't think any of us are exactly well-versed in knowin' about spirits like you.
Well... much as you love talkin' about yourself, Miko, there probably ain't much to say about this part, right?
You're startin' to look pretty hot under the collar, poindexter... you keep sneaking glances at ~player~ like that on purpose, or is it just comin' nautrally?
So is that why you're here tonight? Seein' how much people like your new look? I mean, you'll definitely get an answer, but it'll be quite the forward one.
You've talked about light a fair bit so far, Lux - I'm guessin' you're a paladin of sorts?
If I ain't mistaken, Lux, you're a paladin? I assumed as such what with your apparent penchant for light and all.
...You doin' okay, Ms. Penny? You've seemed a bit off so far tonight.
Well now... there's somethin' real interesting about playing a game like this with a holy woman...
A woman of god comin' to get down and dirty in a place like this... strange times, but who's complainin'?
Quite the unique wardrobe choice there, Ms. Valentine. Don't think I've seen someone pull up to this place with their jacket already half-stripped.
Did you get started a bit too early, Ms. Valentine? You're not supposed to pull off your jacket just yet, after all.
I'm real curious about your outfit, Chun-Li; doesn't look like anything I've ever seen before.
You've got a real interestin' wardrobe there, Chun-Li; I can't think of anyone else in Koprulu with something like it.
Gotta say, it's always nice to see a woman with an appreciation for good strength... I think I chose a good night to come here.
A woman with a good muscle is always a fine sight - especially in a place like this. Barely begun, and you've already got my mind runnin' wild, Chun-Li.
So let me get this straight, Charlie; You made a hotel right in the middle of in Hell to... reform people? That about right?
Well, wasn't expectin' to have company from the dearly departed tonight. You hang with ephemeral types often, Ms. Yuna?
You stick around the ghastly sort often, Ms. Yuna? I don't think most folks here were expecting to play with the dead today.
Wait, so... you're a shrine maiden, Reimu? Are you really allowed to take part in stuff like this?
I gotta ask - what kinda faith allows its shrine maidens to hang in strip poker joints, Reimu?
Kumatora, was it? I'd heard some whispers around that you were somethin' of a firebrand, but I didn't expect them to be so literal, too.
Hope you don't mind, Missy, but... what's the deal with those scars? I've seen veteran marines with less than those.
So, how long have you been thinkin' about this plan, Reimu? You seem pretty confident in it.
You sure sound like you've got faith in this idea of yours, Reimu; have you been workin' on getting married for a while?
Alright, well... what are you lookin' for in a guy or gal? Gotta admit, I'm curious to know your tastes.
Hope you don't mind me askin', but what kind of person are you hopin' to settle down with?
...You sure you're in the right place, Jason? You look less dressed to unwind and more dressed to... well, kill.
You're pretty married to your work, ain't you? Don't know anyone else who'd show up to a place like this in their lab coat.
So, what you asked earlier... yeah. For the past few decades, quite a few folks have been born with psionic potential. Just didn't expect one to show up here, or be quite as carefree as you.
It is good seein' folks like you here, Monika. It's an important reminder that probably not everyone on our Earth is a conquesting tyrant too.
So if you're workin' to become a nurse, Miss Tsumiki, have you thought about where you'll go with it? Locations, fields, all that?
Hope you don't mind me askin', Miss Tsumiki, but have you thought at all about where exactly you'd like to take your skills as a nurse?
I know you said you're tryin' to get away from work for a bit, but mind if I asked what field you study, Heris?
It's funny, Monika - no matter how many times I come here, I still ain't used to seein' young gals like you in uniforms all the way from Earth.
If you don't mind, Heris, has space travel ever been somethin' that's interested you much? Or the concept of studyin' alien life?
Gotta say, I'm impressed with you so far, Fluttershy. This clearly ain't your wheelhouse, but you're standin' tall all the same.
You've surprised me already, Fluttershy. I thought you would've turned tail and ran by now, but you're stickin' with it proudly.
So this "Team Magma" is... some kinda street gang, right?
...Am I right in assumin' the "Team Magma" you're preachin' about here is a street gang of sorts?
...So what kinda group is this "Team Aqua" if they're havin' you call yourself a grunt?
...I don't know what kinda group would ask you to call yourself a grunt, but I feel like I've gotta know now.
To be honest, I hope one day more psionic folk in Koprulu can be like you, Kumatora. Without all the baggage and restrictions.
We're workin' on changing things in Koprulu already, but we've still got a ways to go, Kumatora. Reducin' psionic restrictions oughta be one of 'em.
If time's your main concern, Miss Tsumiki, it shouldn't take longer than a few hours. Warp drives have advanced quite a bit.
Well, thanks to recent warp drive tech, gettin' back to Koprulu should only be a few hours. That's your main concern?
I'll give it to you straight, Heris - my science team needs more minds like yours. Especially when the war's over, there'll be a lot of work for everyone to do.
You're quite the pleasant gal to be around, Fluttershy. How'd you learn to be so welcomin'?
Well, now I gotta learn more about this Team Aqua if you're so proud to even be a grunt for 'em.
Alright, mind fillin' me in on this Team Aqua of yours? I imagine you've got a lot to say.
I'm grateful for your willingness, Miss Tsumiki. And don't worry, I don't intend to put you on a battlefield - it's wounded civilians I've got in mind.
If you're serious about this, Miss Tsumiki, then you've got my thanks. You don't gotta worry about dyin', by the way - I intend to have you helpin' civillians.
C'mon, poindexter, you don't have to act so ashamed about it. 'Sides, you're such an open resource... I don't blame them all for usin' you just like you want.
You sure seem confident 'round here, Noire - is this a kinda game you're familiar with?
You had a lot of practice with games like these, Noire? You've been real confident ever since we began.
You've been stealin' quite a few glances at ~player~, Noire... wasn't that hard for ~player.ifMale(him|her)~ to convince you to tag along, was it?
Quite the look you've got when you're eyein' up ~player~, Noire... ~player.ifMale(he's|she's)~ more than just a card buddy to you, ain't ~player.ifMale(he|she)~?
If you don't mind me askin', Aoba... how did you accidentally end up here?
So... did you really end up here by mistake, Aoba? How does that even work?
So let me get this straight, Dorothy - you really are a fully-sentient android? There ain't no one controllin' you from miles away?
Damn. An actual, fully-intelligent android... Am I right about that, Dorothy? Or are you just bein' controlled by someone far away?
Still wrappin' my mind around you, Dorothy... I thought our bot technology was advanced, but you're still leaps and bounds ahead of it.
It's kinda crazy to think how advanced you are, Dorothy... You've got full sentience and everythin', but our bots barely even change their facial expressions.
Gotta say, cowgirl, I like your style. Good to see the ol' tradition's still alive.
Y'know, Tychus once tried to get Dr. Hansen to play this with him. Let's just say I'm currently where he only wished he was.
Well then... must be my lucky night.
Heh... guess I still am a pig, after all these years.
Well... I think my love for cards is about to go up.
Another hand down for the count... and another player, soon enough.
Don't get too down about it, hun' - lady luck's a fickle woman.
I get they don't ask you to check your guns here, but... a whole rifle's a bit excessive, don't you think?
Alright, I've gone long enough without askin': is there a reason your uniform did... that?
So, Miss Matoi, word on the street is you've been fighting some holier-than-thou tyrant yourself?
Oooh... sorry, hun'.
Alright, ~name~ - time to step to it, girl!
Your turn, hun'.
Matt would probably be warning me against continuing right now... but hell, I gotta see where this goes.
All right... maybe this wasn't such a bad idea after all.
Take all the time you need - hell, that might make it even better for the rest of us.
If I, uh... sneak a peak... sorry.
All of a sudden, losing doesn't seem so bad.
Well... aren't I in the right place now.
A tie in Poker? If this ain't part of some Xel'Naga prophecy...
Well, whaddya know... kinda wish I hadn't knocked out so soon.
Startin' small, I see.
Alright, you're makin' us work for it, then. Fine by me.
Everyone's gotta start somewhere.
Well, that is a pretty snazzy ~clothing~.
Kind of a shame - ~clothing~ fit you nicely.
Not the daring type, ~name~?
Still playing close to your chest. So to speak.
Can't hold off the big guns forever, ~name~.
Hm... I think one of my firebats has something just like ~clothing.ifPlural(those|that)~ ~clothing~.

state.text: Lucky you, still this far ahead.
Damn... how did you get such a lead on me, anyway?
Just don't tell any of my boys I lost this bad...

case.state: Don't expect that to save you for much longer, kid.
Don't try and put it back on when no one's looking, now.
Let's be a bit more risky next time, shall we?
Come on, ~name~, it's called "Strip Poker" for a reason.
Gotta destroy the bunker so you can get to the base, after all. Except a bunker can be impressive.
Hope you weren't plannin' to impress with that.
I'm still swingin' strong, now, so don't expect any lenience!
Stay frosty - bigger stuff's gonna be coming soon.
You just came here with that so you wouldn't have to take off something bigger, didn't you?
Hope you're not the gloatin' type.
Well, at least you're finally gettin' knocked down a few pegs...
Heh... weak...
That ain't nothin'...
Done already?
Really, now? How'd you two even meet, anyway?
Huh. Any kind of story about you two meetin', or...?
Well, wasn't expectin' this. If you don't mind, how'd you two meet?
No worries. It's a first time for me as well... the strippin' part, anyway.
Hey, anyone who tries raisin' a quarrel with you about that is gonna have to deal with me first; and I don't think they want that.
Definitely a different fashion trend if I've ever seen one. Folk where I was raised just tended to wear whatever's comfy and useful.
The Earth part - knowin' that there's a version of Earth out there that's within closer reach than any of us thought. Hopefully one that ain't as imperialist.
Couldn't think of a better term if I tried. Their mining and farming industries were practically run like slave labor, and anyone who wanted out would be disowned.
Guess there ain't never a bad time for thinkin' about that, is there? Idle hands are the devil's playthings, and idle minds are how he uses 'em.
So you're a demigod, now? Demigod of takin' care of people, or somethin' like that?
Looks pretty on you, if you don't mind me sayin'.
Didn't I see one of my Spectres with ~clothing.ifPlural(those|that)~ exact ~clothing~ last week?
Hm... wonder how that would look on Sarah...
It's a start, at least.
At least we're taking this slow, it looks like.
Guess it'll be a while before things get interesting.
Not exactly the most excitin' choice.
Well, it's somethin'.
My parents always told me you'd have to work for the good stuff in life. Guess that's true even in the oddest of times.
If you lived in the Koprulu sector, that'd have probably been blasted apart years ago.
Forgot you had that, really.
Dammit... I really lagged behind here, didn't I?
Well, that's no fun.
Maybe if I squint...
Should've brought some of Tychus' old dirty mags...
Er... well, whatever you say, Boss. Let's make it count!
Hope not. Didn't come here to throw down, but I'm willin' to make an exception for anyone who wants to mess with you.
I sure ain't one to judge. I just pick whatever's on the top of my shelf.
Fair. You typically don't need to worry about their usefulness unless you're rockin' a blue collar.
{small}It's about this Viking pilot who got lost from his squadron tryin' to find his way back - assumin' you don't get blown up by all the nasties in your way. of course.{!reset}
Yeah, suppose that's fair. I'd be lyin' if I said I didn't have trouble rememberin' some of the planets I've visited myself.
Guess I can't blame you. I've heard enough about the multiverse idea to know that infinity would start lookin' old after a bit.
Well, I certainly hope they intend it for more peaceful means in the long run... regardless of whether or not they find other alien life like we did.
State-run. Company towns are what the Kel-Morians have.
Also very true. Guess that's why we're all here to begin with, right?
Only recently, huh? Well, there's another surprise. You don't look a day over... actually, what is considered young by godly immortal standards?
Let's see some big plays next, huh?
Hey, don't touch that jukebox! Big Tuna's playin'!
How much exactly did ~clothing.ifPlural(those|that)~ ~clothing~ set you back, ~name~?
Keep it nice and clean for her, dealer, will ya?
Dang... you kinda do look different now.
Kinda gives you a new look.
Well, I reckon things will get a mite more interesting here.
Alright, back to the action!
Bring it in, dealer!
Next round, let's go!
Guess even the small stuff can make a difference.
Well, at least you're finally gettin' knocked down a few pegs...
Gotta keep my head in the game...
Odds look stacked against me, but I'm used to that.
Lemme just concentrate here...
Hoping you'll pick things up soon.
Tell ya what, ~name~ - I'll give you a pack of smokes if you go for something bigger instead.
Yeah, I agree. In fact, I agree so much that that's why we were fightin' the Dominion, Ms. Penny.
Both are true, I guess. We attacked base camps and supply lines when we could, but often it was to save folks bein' terrorized by the Dominion or left behind to the Zerg.
All right, a step-up from last time...
Still dippin' your toes in the water, ~name~?
Well, it's better than the usual caliber so far...
Still kinda slow... but moving nonetheless.
We're gettin' there - we're definitely gettin' there.
Glad it's not my ~clothing~, at least.
Heh... you're the one to take off your ~clothing~, and yet I'm still feelin' shaky about this.
This game's definitely gotten quite up to speed.
Got plenty of room to catch up... I'm not down just yet.
Still way ahead of me, aren't ya...
If I was a lady, I'd be quivering about now.
Actually... maybe I should be glad you've still got your pants on.
Heh heh... sorry, I just started thinkin' of all the questions my Protoss friend Zeratul would have if he walked in on this.
Wonder if I remembered to lock up my Vulture...
Don't act so worried, now. You still got a lot on ya.
Not the most excitin' game just yet, unfortunately.
To be fair, you usually wear that anyway.
Sorry, kid - I don't impress easily.
Could we get some some Tom Petty in here? Country boy needs his tunes!
Well now... how's your strategy going to change without your ~clothing~, I wonder?
All right; let's give this game some pepper!
Let's kick it up a notch next time, ~name~.
Hope you're prepared to lose some more... I'm certainly prepared to make you lose.
Remember - no puttin' that back on until it's all said and done here, got it? That goes for everyone else, too.
You ain't tough for gettin' rid of that ~clothing~, ~name~. Just so you know.
Feelin' ballsy yet? Heh, lord knows I sure am...
You should hang that up somewhere.
Come on, don't undersell yourself like that, boss. I bet there's plenty of guys back where you're from who have you runnin' in their heads.
Playin' games and eatin' pudding... interested in tradin' lives for a day, Nep?
{small}Well, I've faced every enemy in it for real at some point or another. 'Course, it ain't so easy as it is in the game, but that's gotta count for somethin', right?{!reset}
That's a good point. Especially if the Dominion was anything to go by, since plenty of folks there were unhappy even before their dirty laundry went public.
Woah! Where did you-?
Tell ya what, ~name~ - I'll give you a pack of smokes if you go for something bigger instead.
Don't fret now, ~name~, you got plenty more.
You'll still be covered up pretty well. For better and worse.
Hey, would someone mind turnin' down the volume? I wanna hear my new friends better.
Well... things are progressing quite steadily.
Not the worst thing to ditch, ~name~ - hell, some folk might've even brought it just as extra protection here specifically.
Don't fret now, the dealer'll hand it back when this is done.
Nice ~clothing~... sorry, wrong time?
If this were in Koprulu, at least two of you would've reached for your guns by now. Actually, you'd probably be one of 'em, ~name~.
I'm all for bendin' the rules, but not this time. Hand over the ~clothing~, ~name~.
C'mon, get on my level already, ~name~.
Y'know, if you wanna play it up a bit...
C'mon, help a cowboy out.
Well, maybe they just don't know how to approach you. Nothin' stops guys in their tracks quite like a striking young woman.
Really now? Wasn't expectin' to flock with a bird of your kinda feather here tonight.
Ain't that the truth? A hard life with good friends is worth a dozen easy lives without 'em.
...Committin' a planet-wide holocaust. Just to bring down a regime they turned out to be just as bad as.
Hey, you're still quite the looker without your ~clothing~.
I think the dealer's trustworthy... they better be, anyway.
Be glad Tychus ain't here, ~name~ - he'd keep moanin' for you to ditch something bigger.
So... random question about your ~clothing~, but does it come in Infested Terran size?
Get ready to do it again real soon, ~name~.
Still a ways to go, but we're gettin' there.
I see it'll still be a bit before this game gets all spicy.
Things oughta pick up sooner or later. Hope it won't be because of me, though.
Alright, lady luck - don't fail me now.
Deal me in - I wanna make this next hand count.
Slow and steady wins... always sounded like horseshit to me.
Yeah, that ain't bad...
Heh, you've got my attention.
I like where this is goin'.
If it felt that good seein' you take that off, ~player~... well, I'm lookin' real forward to the endgame.
Lucky dealer; he gets to keep holdin' that 'till the end.
More skin makes quite the win!
I hope you're enjoyin' this as much as I am, ~player~.
Don't take it personally, ~player~, but I'm really lookin' forward to makin' you lose some more.
You're makin' this a real good game, ~player~; I'll see if I can make it just as good for you.
Gettin' warmer, ~player~... how about you?
So it's all come down to this...
Well then, this just got real. Sure beats me doin' it, though.
Heat's definitely pickin' up! Can't get out of the kitchen, though.
I was hopin' someone would remove their ~clothing~ eventually. And that someone wouldn't be me, too.
Is it just me, or did the music get quieter in here?
Mind not draggin' it out, ~name~? I'd appreciate it.
Hoo boy... things are gonna get awkward real soon.
Too late to be shy now...
I won... so why does it feel like I still lost?
Is looking mandatory?
Well, this is sure gonna feel strange...
Heh heh heh...
Jeez, and you still haven't bought me dinner yet?
A little late to the punch, aren't you?
Just startin' now, kid?
I wonder if Mengsk ever played this- actually, no, I don't wanna think about that.
Hm... how long's it been since you last ironed your ~clothing~, ~name~?
You're a real generous soul, ~name~; givin' us all a better view like that.
I like your style, ~name~ - and I'm likin' the rest of you, too.
Sure took a while, ~name~. Startin' to feel the pressure?
Come on, dealer, I'm ready to ride into victory!
No use in pumpin' the brakes now, ~name~. Let's keep it going!
I said I'd win, come Hell or high water... and you're certainly leanin' closer to the former right now, ~name~.
(Alright, I can do this. Long as I keep my head clear, ~name~'ll go down before I do.)
How's it feel bein' closer to my level now, ~name~?
Tell you what - if you let me look, I'll let you do the same.
If you're tryin' to seduce me, it's a bit too late.
Not bad. If you wanted a more physical compliment, though, I'm all tapped out.
Game's still spicy, then?
Well then... not bad.
...Yeah, I think I can look for a couple seconds.
Alright, boss; you have my word I won't look. And I think it'd be best if you gave your word too, ~player~.
Oof, hell of a moment for it to get stuck. Maybe it's loose enough to pull it down now?
Damn, sure sounds like a whole lot goes into it... you must be one hell of a trainer if it's what got you famous.
Sounds to me like a ton of research goes into battlin' as much as it does the Pokemon themselves... you're definitely an exceptional woman if you're skilled in both.
...Wonder if it's too much to ask for another rebellion over there, too. I know Koprulu's had enough war by this point, but the workers stuck in the Combine deserve somethin' better.
Good on you. I ain't the smartest guy around, but even I know the value of brushin' up on the history and happenings of the world.
{small}Definitely glad to hear that. It's a far cry from the kind of mindless, tusks-and-tentacles, moanin'-in-constant-pain sort that the Zerg create.{!reset}
Well, that's certainly fair enough. And if there's anything we can do to help you out too, just say the word!
Sorry, miss, but rules are rules. Not that I'm a stickler for them or anything.
Don't worry - I won't tell if you don't.
Not gonna lie, ~name~; I was kinda looking forward to this.
Must've spent a pretty penny on that ~clothing~, ~name~.
You gotta do what you gotta do.
Probably should've worn an extra if you were worried about it.
Too late to turn back now, ~name~.
Time to turn up the heat!
Well, then... you all prepared to start seein' more skin, boys and girls?
Was kinda wondering how you'd look without your ~clothing~, actually.
Hoo... sure glad Sarah can't read me right now.
(Startin' to wonder if this was how Matt got hitched with Mira...)
Whoo, did Blaze forget to seal the valves on his suit, or is it getting hot in here?
Come on... help out ol' Jimmy.
I won't look if you don't want me, but... well, if it's all good...
This going where I think it's going?
It's all good - if there's anything we can do to help you get more comfy with it, just say the word.
Ah, well, I wouldn't worry too much about that.
I getcha - had a few friends like that myself. Kinda folk you wanna hug with one hand and smack with the other.
Well, she certainly sounds like a good friend, kiddo. When people like her get on your nerves, that just means they like ya.
O-Oh, right. Well, I'm glad about that, for sure.
O-Oh. Well, I'm happy to help, kiddo.
Without a doubt. I can only imagine how celebrated you must be back home.
I sure ain't gonna doubt you on that. Crowds must get quite loud whenever you're on..

condition.saying: Be careful about

case.state: Well now, that's a risky-soundin' promise... luckily, that's just the kinda thing I'm into.
True. Hell, I've seen it firsthand - my chief engineering officer, Swann, was a miner whose people we helped out during an uprising they started.
Pretty logical move, then. 'Those who fail to learn from history', and all that.
Well... let's just say I can guarantee that you're already the nicest zombie I've ever met.
And now the grand reason most people choose to come here...
If you don't mind me sayin' - and I sure hope you don't, considering you're here and all... well, I think you're mighty fine.
If it makes you feel better, ~name~, I think you're quite pretty all around.
Congrats, ~name~: now your clothing weighs as much as the equipment of the average female Ghost in the Dominion.
Riiiiight on!
Your luck's runnin' out, ~name~.
Rock and roll!
Woo... harder knockout than a round from a Siege Tank.
If you don't want me to look, uh... is there any place I should look?
Gettin' real down to the wire, here...
(Actually, is anyone here a telepath? I might be in trouble if that's the case...)
Mmm...
Really likin' where this is goin'...
No better time to be doin' this than now...
Well hot damn... I feel like the luckiest man from Koprulu!
Hoho, man... way to rock my world, ~player~!
Bein' honest, I like your ~clothing~ on the floor even more than I like it on you.
Hoo baby... you're gettin' my Vulture revved up already, ~player~.
I like your style, ~player~... among other things.
Well now... wanna be my new poker partner, ~name~?
Startin' to look real forward to watchin' you lose, ~name~...
Not a bad shirt, ~name~... shame you're gonna lose it.
Like Tychus would say; "Sun's out, guns out!"
I've seen plenty of squadmates in the showers before; it's only awkward if you make it.
Hey, you gotta own your body. Don't be shy!
Hell of a time to start losin' your shirt, hoss.
Just gonna be glad it wasn't me again...
No use in tellin' you to keep your shirt on, sparky... heh.
Well? Everyone's waitin'...
Right...
Hey, once you've seen Swann on a drunken bender, nothing's that shocking anymore.
Want me to buy you a drink? You look like you can put 'em away like the devil!
See? You got nothin' to be shy about!
Not bad. Bit more lifting each day, and you'd be right 'n fine.
Damn... we really could've used you when recruitment numbers were low.
With a body like that, I bet you could go toe-to-toe with one of them Tal'Darim warriors.
Don't let any Dominion recruiters catch you, now - they'll be on you like stink on a Roach.
Damn... you're lookin' pretty good, actually.
Well, aren't you quite the sight?
Alright. What's the next thing to go?
Let's keep this game rolling!
C'mon, man; this is strip poker; you should've come prepared to show us the goods.
Hope you don't mind this part, ~name~... you'd be the only one here who does right now.
Heh, were you hopin' for this exact situation, ~name~?
Don't be shy - you'll still look good either way.
Hey, you are quite the handsome fella...
Alright, ~name~, let's see what you're working with here.
I ain't gonna judge you, ~name~, so ease up a little.
Don't look so sheepish - you knew what you were gettin' into.
C'mon, man; this is strip poker; you should've come prepared to show us the goods.
Hope you don't mind this part, ~name~... you'd be the only one here who does right now.
C'mon, you've already looked plenty, ~name~. Fair's fair.
Well? I ain't waitin' forever.
No need to be shy, ~name~ - lord knows I sure ain't right now.
You're a good-lookin' guy, ~name~... believe me.
You're all good, man.
It's not the size of the gun, after all... it's how well you use it.
Don't worry, ~name~ - only opinion that matters is the lucky one you're spendin' your time with.
Hey, just remember that even a marine can take down a battlecruiser.
It's not that bad, now, is it?
One more, and that's that.
Feelin' the heat yet? Better not slip up, now.
Over and done with. Now let's not lag.
Not bad, not bad...
Guess that wasn't a grenade in your pants...
Bet you've got quite the happy partner, ~name~...
Damn... was it that big before?
Heh, you eager to join me in the loser's ring already?
Well, aren't you blessed?
Woah! Almost thought you'd snuck in a Zerg larva for a sec!
You know what they say about pride and how it goeth before the fall, right?
You know, I'd almost think you were lookin' forward to this part.
Well, this is quite the pickle you've got- shit, I mean I'm in.
...Okay, you wanna explain why you're packin' a wagon without any horses?
And the Nexus lies bare...
Wasn't plannin' on this, were ya?
Well, look who's proud of himself.
Yeah, don't worry. This ain't gonna leave this place.
Yeah? What kinda mistakes were that?
Sorry if I sound eager, ~name~, but this'll be the first human pair I've seen in a long time.
Don't see why a bot would need a chest like that... but hey, who's complainin'?
Guess we know where your builder's mind was goin' when they made this part of you, ~name~.
Too late to be reluctant now, isn't it?
Wouldn't be shocked if some of our new friends here were thinkin' about this moment all game.
You've still got a chance, ~name~. Don't lose hope just yet.
Well... yeehaw, then!
Show us somethin' good, will ya?
This should be good...
What? So... wait, is bein' a goddess just some kinda---
I... wha... So--- So what's the point of even bein'---
If you ask me, ~name~, any guy would be lucky to have you.
Just remember: large breasts may fill a man's hands, but small breasts... will fill a man's heart.
Niiiiiice...
This is gettin' good...
Now there's a couple of Spider Mines I wouldn't mind steppin' into...
Clock's ticking down for you, compadre. Think you can still turn it around?
It's all good, boss. Just take it a step at a time, alright?

condition.saying: On your six

case.state: That's a good point, sure, but there's plenty of good work out there where the difference ain't too important. 'Sides, I'd have bigger worries if you were on a battlefield anyway.
Right, right. You won't find yourself suited for everything, kiddo... but then again, who is?
Good for them. Just hope they can match you when it comes to knowin' history... that and how to take down the scumbags at the top.
...Reaaaaally hopin' you're not secretly a telepath here, ~name~.
Well, guess it's my lucky day after all.
Young and beautiful... you know, you really are quite blessed.
Thanks for makin' this a bit better, hun'.
Good for you... and me, too.
Damn, I don't think the Dominion Ghost Program has any suits that would fit you.
You're not dealing with any back pains, are you, ~name~?
Suddenly I'm rememberin' several of those Azeroth ladies back in the Nexus...
Holy hot damn!
Couple 'a Carriers, loaded with fun...
Sure puts a smile on this old cowboy's face...
Heh, way nicer than our adjutant units.
Woah... guess robotics came one hell of a long way where you're from, ~name~.
Sure beats the holo-stripper in the Hyperion's bar.
Rock and roll!
Outstanding!
Damn, now that's a pretty sight.
Well, that definitely helps.
That's the spirit - you got this, Nagisa!
That's a relief. I like a pretty sight and all, but usin' someone else's girl to do it without permission just don't sit right with me.
Y'know, this might be kinda nice if it wasn't for everyone else here.
You know, I think I'm really warmin' up to this game.
I'd be lyin' if I said curiosity hadn't struck me by this point, ~name~.
I can look away for a moment if you need.
C'mon, ~name~, don't leave us hangin'.
Hope you're ready, ~name~, 'cause I don't think the others are gonna wait.
C'mon, ~name~, don't leave us hangin'.
I'm done here, but you can still impress me.
Hey, if I could do what I just did, you can definitely do this.
Well... 'least I won't be alone on this no more.
Sorry. I'm tryin' not to chuckle about this situation.
Well? You got the goods, right?
Wonder if Sarah might be up for joinin' sometime...
Heh, c'mon now - I can't see that happening even if I wanted to.
Well, that's true too. Nothin' spoils the mood more than an awkward comment or gesture.
Right, right, I gotcha. For real though, you've got a good heart, kiddo.
Heh, I'm definitely with you on that. I'm just glad that I'm doin' this here and not in the usual gamblin' pubs in Koprulu.
Heh, grown a likin' to this place already, have you? Well, I've seen some pretty cool types around here already, so I think you'll have a good chance.
What can I say? My folks raised me right... or tried to, anyway.
Game's not over yet, ~name~. Give us some pepper!
However this game ends, ~name~, consider all drinks on me.
Sorry, kid, but I've come too far to go easier on you now.
Hey, don't worry. It'll still be special when you meet that right someone.
Hoo... situation feels tigther than Swann in an SCV.
So... it's you or me, then.
Won't be surprised if Tosh can sense everything I saw here later...
Woah... were you gettin' excited about this part, hun'?
If it gets too much, just take a deep breath. It's all good.
Damn... looks soft...
P-Pretty...
Ahhhh...
Hey, ~player~, I've been meanin' to ask... what's the homeless guy from the alley doin' here?

state.text: Heh, sorry, partner, but this joint ain't big enough for two Jims.
"Daddy"? ...You got somethin' of a one-track mind, don't you?
...I'm just gonna assume you're callin' yourself "Master" 'cause you're a big fan of ol' James Hetfield.

case.state: Pleasure to meet ya, Matt... you know, for some reason, I think I like you already.

state.text: Sorry, but I don't know any non-weirdos who still say "Mommy". Know a couple who say "Big momma", though.
Sorry, Miss, but I only got room for one queen in my life, and you ain't her.

case.state: Your name's Sarah, huh... oh, sorry, don't mind me.

state.text: Great... gotta deal with some other royal scooter even outside Koprulu.
...Nope. I did not come all the way from Korhal just to play cards with someone namin' themselves after a cartoon character.

case.state: They still got plenty of farms back on Earth, ~name~? Can't imagine that old tradition ever goin' away.
So, "Phantom Thieves", huh? You like a group of desparados or something?
Gotta say, didn't expect to find other revolutionaries in this joint. Feels like meetin' kindred spirits.
Can't help but wish we knew about your lot sooner, ~Name~. With your help, we might've taken down Mengsk in a matter of days.
Really now? This "Starr Park" sounds quite unlike any war theatre I've seen before.
Never heard of folk fightin' so hard for just a park before. Must be quite the special one.
"Brawlers", huh? That some kinda special merc team?
Interestin'... I take it that "brawlers" are a type of mercenary where you come from?
Damn, fightin' robots? People like to tell stories about that, but I didn't think it'd become reality elsewhere.
Fightin' robots, then? Sounds like you're livin' every science fiction nerd's dream!
I think freaks like her just do it to feel a rush, Nova... like a junkie snortin' coke for breakfast.
Go for it, Nova. If I can't manage, then make sure you do.
Hey, I ain't accusin' you of breaking the rules or anything. It's just that strip poker and that sort of quiet demeanor don't usually go hand-in-hand.

condition.saying: F-f-from some deep literature I like! I mean!

case.state: Don't worry, lil' devil, we totally believe you. Right, everyone?

condition.saying: (B-but Pit's so handsome and nice... And small...)

case.state: You know, Kentucky, I've seen saints turn to sinners, and sinners turn to saints...
Heh, definitely not a style I've ever seen before. Lot of people dress like that where you're from?
Wouldn't call myself a gamer or anything, but I am quite partial to the Lost Vikings cabinet I got.
Hm... I'm assuming it's not a self-imposed isolation? It ain't exactly the most beneficial state to be in.
Huh... haven't heard of many Terran systems before that were self-isolated. And the ones that were... don't really have much choice.
Huh, explorers by accident... how's it workin' out for you so far?
Wouldn't have been my first guess. You're still breathin', so I'd assume adjusting wasn't too hard.
Drug trade, huh... figured it was probably somethin' sketchy.
Drug cartel? Haven't run into one of those in quite some time.
Hired gun for shady crews, then... this joint's feelin' more like Koprulu already.
Huh... encountered plenty of pirate mercs before, myself. Some tryin' to kill me, others tryin' to work for me.
Huh. Certainly not the company I would've expected...
Well then... you sure know how to pick your friends, don't you?
Fair, fair... still, peep shows can't be much more expensive where you come from.
Suppose I get that... though, I dunno, wouldn't a peep show or the like be more convenient?
Figured that; but your shorts look like they could barely hold one without rippin' up somethin' fierce.
Wasn't sure you could even fit one in those shorts - almost thought you might be snaggin' 'em from me when I'm not lookin'.
I get it, I get it - pot callin' the kettle black and all that. Or the kettle's lungs, in this case.
Ain't tryin' to play havoc in my glass house, partner - I'm probably the last person here who should be doin' that.
Damn... divide 'em up so they can't stand together... downright insidious.
Jeez... that's one twisted scheme right there. Separatin' folk so they can't stand up for each other...
Well, you sure don't seem too concerned with losin' - not that I've got a problem with that, of course.
Heh, you almost sound like you're lookin' forward to getting knocked out; can't say I disagree.
Hm, can't recall ever seein' a crewman outfitted like you. Certainly not any pirates like you, neither.
Pirate crews must be pretty different in your sector, then. Most pirates in Koprulu just try lookin' as nasty as possible.
{small}Wouldn't expect you to be the type to be strapped for clothes, Miss Jura. Definitely not what I'd expect to see worn in necessity, either.{!reset}
Clothes ain't some kinda rare commodity or somethin', are they, Miss Jura? Seems odd that that'd be the only choice available.
Huh... I've seen folk who don't have much to wear before myself, but they don't exactly have ones as nice as yours.
This ain't even your old body? Then what kinda body is it?
So if this ain't the body you used to have... what, did ~player~ make you this body too?
Oh... hey, I'm sorry, kid, I didn't mean to-
Oh- shit... sorry, I didn't know-
Well, sure, but... how'd ~human.ifMale(he|she)~ do it? And why?
I mean, I know that much, but I'm still kinda missin' the how and the why.
{small}Coulda' fooled me. People typically only look as pale as you if they've lost a whole lotta blood... though Hydralisk venom can do that to you too.{!reset}
How long ago was that? You look like you ain't seen a ray of sunlight in a dozen years.
Never heard of colonies workin' like that - hell, how would it work anyway?
And it works? I probably sound like some mouth-breathin' moron to you, but I ain't ever even heard of anyplace like this.
Wait... did I just hear you say you destroyed your world? I can't tell if you're usin' hyperbole anymore.
So you've been--- hold up, did you just say you destroyed your own world together? As in, the whole place you came from?
Huh? How do you birth someone "because" the place you're in's gone all to hell?
...No offense, but you must have one cruel mom if she made you "because" your home's all crap.
Hm... I take it your employers ain't exactly the type to let a good merc go so easily.
Damn... must be quite fond of you if your absence would make 'em that nasty.
Huh... 18... not too far off from what Johnny would've...
18, huh... old enough to have been in the same school as Johnny, if he'd...
Kinda wish I'd gotten to see more myself. I grew up on a farmin' world, and the scene wasn't exactly big there.
{small}I'd never gotten to see much of the pro gamin' stuff, livin' on a mostly agricultural planet and all, but it's intriguing knowin' how big it got.{!reset}
...Final enemy? The hell are you talkin' about?
Yeah? How big was this big, bad foe that neither of you could take on your own?
...Do I even wanna know what this process was like?
Christ... I'm willin' to bet this "process" was just as nice as the rest of you.
Killin' for its own sake ain't no purpose, kid. You're just as empty as you were when you were a corpse.
Power to what - destroy and kill again and again? There ain't no meanin' in that. Hell, your own death had more meanin'.
Seriously? Even pubs in Koprulu aren't this liberal... then again, I haven't seen too many short-fused types here yet.
{small}Really... you're tellin' me they'll get their panties in a bigger twist over someone tryin' to get naked than a weapon that most civvies can't even buy?{!reset}
So what, you just carry it with you wherever you go? Even a place like this?
Really... you're tellin' me there's somethin' you've seen more intimidating than a rocket launcher?
Yeah... but one of 'em came close, right? And if you can bleed, then you can die, too. No "ifs" about it.
Maybe... but this "Sans" almost had you, didn't he? Fool you are, you gotta know deep down that there's a reason to be worried.
Battles? Huh... I'm hopin' these are well-sanctioned enough to be a far cry from the illegal kinds of fightin' rings out there.
You mean people train these Pokemon to fight? Hm... I take it these ain't the crooked types of fightin' rings, right?
Yeah, I agree. There's all kinds'a good folks who come in around here, from what I've seen. There just ain't no guarantee who you'll run into here, though.
Heh, yeah, I've known my fair share of hornballs too, kiddo - even before tonight. Long as they know there's a time and a place, though, they can still be plenty fun.
I'm definitely glad to hear that, kiddo. They seem to like you too, so you can probably count on tonight bein' another victory for your lil' friend quest.
Well, that's life, ain't it? Always meetin' odd folk, hopin' they're at least the good kind of odd?
Got a penchant for fannin' the hammer, do ya? Not many folks where I come from still practice that.
Well, you see the iron I've got, of course, though it's hardly a main piece for me. Rifles are usually more well-suited for the kinds of threats in Koprulu.
I mean, how would it even work, anyway? I think we all use different currency where we come from, and I doubt management here's got all of 'em.
Well... then what would they be payin' us with? We use credits in Koprulu, but who's to say they use that, or any kinds of cash other folks here use?
Heh, you're certainly more jovial about bein' dead than most ghosts you hear about. The ones in stories are always on the... grumpier side about it, to say the least.
Right... you have some kinda plan for how to go about it? I mean, that ain't the kinda thing you'd take on unless you really thought about it, but...
Princess, huh? Let me guess; you're one of these 'sword and sorcery' types who's been blessed by the wonders of magic, right?
Minor? You must've dealt with some pretty bad scrapes if those count as "minor" for you.
What, so it didn't occur to you to get more? Or is it somethin' else?
Well... yeah. Until recently, the biggest governments would whisk away psionic children and make 'em into livin' weapons - and they didn't always ask the parents how they felt, too.
...Hate to say it, but yep. In Koprulu, psionic kids are lucky if they make it to their 7th birthday before bein' scoped out and carried away to be weaponized.
Hm... I know it's a bit of a tall order, but... you wouldn't possibly be interested in work farther away, would you? Medical help is sorely needed where I come from.
Well... it's askin' a lot, but would you by any chance consider a job farther away? A title like "Ultimate Nurse" would be worth a lot where I'm from.
You're the highest-rankin' one? Really?
Seriously? You're the best they have to offer?
Ah, so you've got some experience in the field already, do you?
We're all glad you're enjoyin' yourself, then. Just don't expect us to go easy here, either.
That's good to know. I've still got more to do before I'm finally whisked away to the gates up high... assumin' I even get to go there, of course.
Well, imagine that! Funny, you look different from how war angels were described in certain other texts. Not nearly as many eyes, for one.
You said it, boss. I've been to a whole lotta different places, but none with a crowd quite as colorful as this.
I mean, you sound like you know this family well, don't you? I have a hard time imagining a crime group tryin' to get close to a sweetheart like you.
Sure never had a classmate doin' something like that where I grew up. Knew a couple boys who brought rat skulls for good luck, but the faculty didn't like 'em being displayed like that.
Truth be told, I never really thought about that much. Though I guess our teams in sports like Demolition probably helped with that.
I don't think you have to worry. 'Sides, I'm lookin' out for you either way.
Well... if it helps at all, I'm sure everyone here understands. We're all just happy to have your company.
Nah, it ain't your fault or anything. Just kinda easy for me to forget our tech ain't the same as everyone else's - I'm still new here.
Hey, it's all good. I haven't been outside the sector all that much, so I ain't used to people still behind us in technology.
